src:
Kloter Ke-6 Jemaah Umrah Marbut-Majelis Taklim DKI Bertolak ke Tanah Suci
04 Nov 2019, 11:43 by Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo
Jakarta - Kloter keenam jemaah umrah marbut dan pengurus majelis taklim DKI Jakarta bertolak ke Tanah Suci. Keluarga turut melepas keberangkatan mereka.


Marbut dan majelis taklim berkumpul untuk mendapatkan pengarahan dari Ketua DMI DKI Jakarta, KH Ma'mun Al Ayyubi. Foto: Kanavino/detikcom

Para marbut dan pengurus majelis taklim sudah berkumpul di Jakarta Islamic Centre, Jakarta Utara, sejak pukul 03.30 WIB, Senin (4/10/2011). Mereka kemudian menunaikan Salat Subuh berjemaah.
Setelah salat, marbut dan majelis taklim berkumpul untuk mendapatkan pengarahan dari Ketua DMI DKI Jakarta, KH Ma'mun Al Ayyubi. Lalu para jemaah berfoto bersama di depan kantor Jakarta Islamic Centre.
Marbut dan majelis taklim kemudian berangkat menuju Bandara Soekarno Hatta. Mereka mengenakan baju koko warna putih dibalut jaket warna oranye. Rombongan keluarga juga ikut mengantar keberangkatan hingga ke bandara.
text:
The 6th Group of the Marbut Umrah Congregation-DKI Taklim Assembly Departs to the Holy Land
Nov 04 2019, 11:43 by Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo
Jakarta - The sixth group of Umrah marbut congregants and the board of trustees of the DKI Jakarta taklim assembly departed for the Holy Land. The family also let go of their departure.


Marbut and the majelis assembled to get directions from the Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DMI, KH Ma'mun Al Ayyubi. Photo: Kanavino / detikcom

The marbut and the taklim board members have gathered at the Jakarta Islamic Center, North Jakarta, since 03.30 West Indonesia Time on Monday (10/10/2011). They then performed the Morning Prayer in congregation.
After the prayer, the marbut and the taklim assembly gathered to get a briefing from the Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DMI, KH Ma'mun Al Ayyubi. Then the congregation took a group photo in front of the Jakarta Islamic Center office.
Marbut and majelis taklim then left for Soekarno Hatta Airport. They wore white koko clothes wrapped in orange jackets. Family entourage also took the departure to the airport.
